00020 #include "agg_basics.h"
00021 #include "agg_render_buffer.h"
00022 #include "agg_render_bgr24.h"
00023 
00024 
00025 namespace agg
00026 {
00027 
00028     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00029     void render_bgr24::clear(const color& c)
00030     {
00031         unsigned y;
00032         unsigned r = c.r >> 8;
00033         unsigned g = c.g >> 8;
00034         unsigned b = c.b >> 8;
00035         for(y = 0; y < m_rbuf->get_height(); y++)
00036         {
00037             register unsigned char* ptr = m_rbuf->get_row(y);
00038             register unsigned x = m_rbuf->get_width();
00039             while(x--)
00040             {
00041                 *ptr++ = (unsigned char)b;
00042                 *ptr++ = (unsigned char)g;
00043                 *ptr++ = (unsigned char)r;
00044             }
00045         }
00046     }
00047 
00048 
00049     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050     void render_bgr24::put_pixel(int x, int y, const color& c)
00051     {
00052         register unsigned char* ptr = m_rbuf->get_row(y) + x + x + x;
00053         *ptr++ = (unsigned char)(c.b >> 8);
00054         *ptr++ = (unsigned char)(c.g >> 8);
00055         *ptr   = (unsigned char)(c.r >> 8);
00056     }
00057 
00058 
00059     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00060     color render_bgr24::get_pixel(int x, int y)
00061     {
00062         color c;
00063         register unsigned char* ptr = m_rbuf->get_row(y) + x + x + x;
00064         c.b = int16u((*ptr++) << 8);
00065         c.g = int16u((*ptr++) << 8);
00066         c.r = int16u((*ptr)   << 8);
00067         return c;
00068     }
00069 
00070 
00071     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072     void render_bgr24::rectangle(rect rc, const color& c)
00073     {
00074         rc.normalize();
00075         if(rc.clip(m_rbuf->get_clip_box()))
00076         {
00077             int y;
00078             unsigned r = c.r >> 8;
00079             unsigned g = c.g >> 8;
00080             unsigned b = c.b >> 8;
00081             unsigned offset = rc.x1 * 3;
00082             for(y = rc.y1; y <= rc.y2; y++)
00083             {
00084                 register unsigned char* ptr = m_rbuf->get_row(y) + offset;
00085                 register unsigned width = unsigned(rc.x2 - rc.x1 + 1);
00086                 while(width--)
00087                 {
00088                     *ptr++ = (unsigned char)b;
00089                     *ptr++ = (unsigned char)g;
00090                     *ptr++ = (unsigned char)r;
00091                 }
00092             }
00093         }
00094     }
